title: WERE OSO BIA KEELE CHINEKE (GODâ€™S WAYS ARE TRULY HERE)
author: Traditional Igbo liturgical chant
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (regional Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Were oso bia nye Chineke onyinye

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Chineke enyego gi aku n'uba nk'uwa
Mana o bughi ka i were Ya mebisie onwe gi
Onyere gi Ya k'iwere Ya fee Ya n'uwa
Ma binyere Ya na ndu ebebe

sections.title: Verse 3
content: I Duru Ogaidilya, ya buru na ime chineke
I buru ogbenye, ya buru n'ime Chineke
Maka na a bu Chineke n'enye onyinye nile

sections.title: Verse 4
content: I mekata were onyinye Chineke nyere gi
O bughin'elu uwa nke a oburu n'uwa ozo
